description.ko: 바다의 미드나이트 존으로 내려가는 매혹적인 여정으로, 심해의 거대한 압력 속에서도 생물 발광 생명체가 번성하는 숨겨진 생태계를 보여줍니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing descent into the midnight zone of the ocean, revealing a hidden ecosystem where bioluminescent life thrives in the crushing pressure of the deep.

prompt: Cinematic wide-angle shot of the deep ocean abyss, bioluminescent flora and fauna glowing in neon blues and purples, hydrothermal vents casting golden light, high-tech research submersible in the distance, photorealistic, 8k, volumetric lighting, particles of sea snow.
